mapper.insert: INSERT INTO foodthrecom(foodthrecomno,hrecom, goalsno, mhno,rdate) VALUES (foodthrecom_seq.nextval,#{foodthrecomno}, #{recom}, #{goalsno},#{mhno},sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT fr.* FROM foodrecom fr JOIN mh mh ON fr.mhno = mh.mhno JOIN member m ON mh.memberno = m.memberno WHERE m.memberno = #{memberno}
